definitions.definition: the action or process of making a copy of something.
examples: the cost of color reproduction in publication is high

definitions.definition: the production of offspring by a sexual or asexual process.
examples: breeding, procreation, multiplying, propagation the process of reproduction

definitions.definition: a copy of a work of art, especially a print or photograph of a painting.
synonyms: photocopy; trademarkXerox "a reproduction of the original"

definitions.definition: made to imitate the style of an earlier period or of a particular artist or craftsman.

examples: the design was changed to allow louder reproduction
